doc.summary: A simple <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/common/capabilities/ICapabilityProvider">capability provider</ref> for a single capability that is  lazily initialised.
doc.text: A simple <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/common/capabilities/ICapabilityProvider">capability provider</ref> for a single capability that is  lazily initialised. For all other capabilities, a parent provider will be queried.
